title: Constructivist Microlearning for Understanding Groundwater Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content for working professionals, accessible exclusively via smartphones without PCs

learning_goals: Learners identify three core mechanisms explaining the formation and circulation processes of groundwater
Learners conduct case analyses comparing groundwater pollution and conservation strategies
Learners predict groundwater level changes using smart device-based simulation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
